main_definition: Relating to the body or material things, as opposed to mental or spiritual aspects.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Involving actual movement of the body and muscles.
meanings_and_examples.example: I physically lifted the heavy box.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Pertaining to bodily health or functioning, not mental state.
meanings_and_examples.example: She was concerned about his physical well-being after the accident.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Involving actual contact with a person or object, as opposed to remote interaction.
meanings_and_examples.example: He physically shook hands with everyone at the meeting.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Relating to physical properties or attributes rather than abstract qualities.
meanings_and_examples.example: The painting's colors were striking but its texture, a physical quality, was lacking.
